description: The Pale Indian Plantain, Arnoglossum atriplicifolium, is an amazing plant species due to its ability to thrive in a variety of environments. It is a perennial herb that is native to North America and can be found in all parts of the continent. This plant was traditionally used by Native Americans for medicinal purposes, though it still has a wide variety of uses today. Its foliage is deep green and its flowers are small and white, providing a beautiful addition to any garden. The Pale Indian Plantain is also a low-maintenance plant, and is tolerant to both dry and wet soils. It is an excellent choice for any gardener or landscape looking for a hardy, low-maintenance species!
